data.name: lblAdminGeneral_Settings.Text
data.value: Manage general settings, like video convert, file storage (local or Amazon S3), seo optimization, Google web sitemap, Google video sitemap, ad video, video view/comment/rating roles, photo watermark/thumbnail generate, abuse report, dnn builit-in journal/Google Maps integration, etc.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_Author.Text
data.value:
Edit users who have posted videos/audios on your site.

Note, you can use CrossVideo_Author sub module to show authors to public.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_UDT.Text
data.value:
Each gallery can has its own attributes. For example, when you publish video, you may want to specify its "Director". When you publish audio, you may want to specify its "Composer".

Media attributes (e.g. "Director" or "Actor") are used to create these inter-dependant variations. After create an attribute, author can then enter specific attribute values for an individual video/audio (e.g. "Bruce Lee", "Jack Chen", "Sylvester Stallone").

data.name: lblNoPermission.Text
data.value: You don't have permission to view this module, please register or login in.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_Type.Text
data.value:
Galleries are top-level unit to organize data. Each gallery has its own categories / attributes / tags / videos (or audios), you must create at least 1 gallery before post videos (or audios). You can also hide unwanted fields or create extend fields for each gallery.

Please note the "Media Type" property while creating galleries. Normally you need create 2 galleries (one "Media Type" property is "Video", the other "Media Type" is "Audio") to post both videos and audios. After galleries creation, you can use CrossVideo_Type sub module to display them to public.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_Category.Text
data.value:
Categories allow you to group videos/audios easier. Cross Video Gallery supports unlimited level categoires. A video/audio can belong to multiple categories.

Note, you must create at least 1 category for each gallery before post videos/audios. After categoires creation, you can use CrossVideo_Category sub module to show them to public.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_Video.Text
data.value:
Manage stand alone videos/audios which created by all authors. These videos/audios are single media which don't belong to any serials. If you want to post new video/audio, click "My Videos & Audios - My stand alone videos & audios" instead.

Note, you can use CrossVideo_List (and CrossVideo_ListDashboard) sub module to show videos/audios (include standard alone media and serials) to public. You can also add other sub modules (like CrossVideo_Search, CrossVideo_Archive, CrossVideo_WatchHistory...) to let visitors search videos/audios easily.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_Tag.Text
data.value:
Author can add multiple tags to a video/audio while edit it, click here to manage these tags.

Note, you can use CrossVideo_TagList (and CrossVideo_TagDashboard) sub module to show tags to public.

data.name: lblAuthor_File.Text
data.value: Your files (videos/audios/images/documents, etc), upload them before attach with your videos (or audios). We recommend you create sub folders first, then upload related files under them.

data.name: lblAuthor_Folder.Text
data.value: Your folders, configure them before upload files.

data.name: lblAuthor_Profile.Text
data.value: Your biography, avartar email, and video/audio default protect password.

data.name: lblAuthor_Video.Text
data.value:
Add/edit your stand alone videos/audios here. These videos/audios are single media which don't belong to any serials. After add a media, you can attach multiple images/documents with it.

Cross Video Gallery module supports both HTML5 & Flash player to play your videos/audios. It automatically selects the best playback for your viewer's device and browser, so you deliver unparalleled video/audio experience on iPhone, iPad, Android, Mobile, and the Desktop. You will see a "Video/Audio format support" tab while adding videos/audios, please read it first before add your media.

data.name: lblAuthor_Ticket.Text
data.value: Help ticket is a one-to-one help mechanism between you and visitors. Click here to view visitors submitted help tickets to your videos/audios.

data.name: lblReader_Ticket.Text
data.value: Help ticket is a one-to-one help mechanism between you and media authors. Click here to view your submitted help tickets.

data.name: lblReader_Watch.Text
data.value: Your video/audio play list, you can submit help ticket to them.

data.name: lblAdminGeneral_Role.Text
data.value: Specify roles which can post videos/audios and manage their files. Users belong to these roles can access "CrossVideo_Admin module - My Videos & Audios" section to post videos/audios. Note, site administrators can post videos/audios and manage their files by default.

data.name: lblHelp_MimeType.Text
data.value:
Module needs a few mime type support to work. You can add them as following if not available. Take flash video (.flv) as example.

    1.On the Windows 2003 server, open the Internet Information Services Manager.

    2.Expand the Local Computer Server.

    3.Right-click the local computer server and select Properties.

    4.Select the MIME Types tab.

    5.Click the New... button and enter the following information:

    6.Associated Extension box: .FLV.

    7.MIME Type box: flv-application/octet-stream

    8.Click Ok.

    9.Restart the World Wide Web Publishing service.

    You need also add below mime types using the same steps.

     .xap mime -type: application/x-silverlight-app, for upload files

     .mp4 mime -type: video/mp4, for playing mp4 videos

     .mp3 mime -type: audio/mpeg,for playing mp3 music

Here is a list of the related file extension and its mime type,they are not necessary,just for reference.

     .rbs mime type: application/octet-stream.

     .3gp mime -type: video/3gpp

     .m4v mime -type: video/x-m4v

     .m4a mime -type: audio/x-m4a

     .m4b mime -type: audio/m4b

     .wmv mime -type: video/x-ms-wmv

     .avi mime -type: video/x-msvideo

     .asf mime -type: video/x-ms-asf

     .mov mime -type: video/quicktime

     .webm mime -type: video/webm

data.name: secHelp_MimeType.Text
data.value: Flash video (.flv)/H.264 (.mp4) and Silverlight upload control mime type

data.name: ConfigTip_A3Auth.Text
data.value: Please configure your Amazon A3 information in "Admin Control Panel - Configuration - Global Settings" first.

data.name: ConfigTip_VideoType.Text
data.value: Please create at least 1 gallery in "Admin Control Panel - Data Manager - Galleries" first.

data.name: ConfigTip_VideoCategory.Text
data.value: There are some galleries (for example, the "{0}" gallery) which have no categories associated. Please add at least 1 category for each gallery in "Admin Control Panel - Data Manager - Categories" first.

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter description of your site (600 character limit)

data.name: plLogo.Help
data.value: Enter your site logo url (gif/jpg/png files)

data.name: plName.Help
data.value: Enter your site name, can't be null

data.name: plUrl.Help
data.value: Enter your site url, it is better to enter full url which contains the CrossVideo_List module instance.

data.name: plInvoiceId.Help
data.value:
You currently have Cross Video standard edition, please enter your invoice id while bought this module and click "Register". Note, don't click "Register" button if you just want to test this module on your site!!

    Normally vendor will send invoice id to your mail address when you buy module. You can also login to site where you bought this module to find invoice id. If you bought it from snowcovered.com, click "My Account" after login to snowcovered.com. If you bought it from http://DnnModule.com, visit http://DnnModule.com/store.aspx and click "My orders" to find invoice id.

    Contact xiaoqi98@msn.com if you have any problem while register this module.
    Thanks for your support.

data.name: lblHelp_Online.Text
data.value: Visit http://DnnModule.com to get online help

data.name: lblAuthor_Serial.Text
data.value: Serial is a group of videos/audios. After add a serial, you can put multiple videos/audios into it so visitor can watch/listen them together. You can also attach multiple images/documents with it.

data.name: lblAuthor_YouTubeRss.Text
data.value:
If you have multiple videos which hosted by YouTube.com and you want to show them on this site, you can create YouTube RSS items here. Module will check your RSS items periodically and automatic imports related videos into your stand alone videos (or into your serials).

Cross Video Gallery allows you create RSS items base YouTube standard feeds, user upload/user favorite/user play list, or search from YouTube category and tag, etc. For example, you can create a RSS item based your YouTube user account, so whenever you upload a new video on YouTube.com, it will also be imported into this site automatically.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_Serial.Text
data.value: Manage serials which created by all authors. Serial is a group of videos/audios. Author can put multiple videos/audios into a serial so visitor can watch/listen them together. If you want to post new serial, click "My Videos & Audios - My Serials" instead.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_YouTubeRss.Text
data.value:
Manage YouTube RSS items which created by all authors. Author can create RSS items from YouTube (base YouTube standard feeds, user upload/user favorite/user play list, or search from YouTube category and tag, etc.). If you want to create new RSS item, click "My Videos & Audios - My YouTube RSS" instead.

By default, module will automatic check these RSS items and import videos every 2 hours. You can change retrieve period by click dnn built-in "Host - Schedule" menu.

data.name: lblAdminVideo_Abuse.Text
data.value: If a visitor feels a video/audio is inappropriate, he can submit a abuse report to site administrators. Click here to view these reports.

data.name: lblReader_Abuse.Text
data.value: If you feel a video/audio is inappropriate, you can submit a abuse report to site administrators. Click here to view your abuse reports and site administrator's response.

data.name: secHelp_SendReceiveMail.Text
data.value: How to send & receive mail notification

data.name: secShowcase.Text
data.value: Showcase of Cross Video Gallery module

data.name: plSiteMap.Help
data.value: Video sitemap url for your site, you can submit to Google webmaster tools to let Google index your videos more easily.

data.name: secHelp_VideoSiteMap.Text
data.value: How to submit your video sitemap to Google

data.name: Tip_ForAdministratorAndManageRole.Text
data.value: This section is available for site administrators and roles which are specified in "CrossVideo_Admin sub module - Admin control panel - Configurations - Global Settings - General - Data Manage Roles".

data.name: Tip_ForAdministratorOnly.Text
data.value: This section is available for site administrators only.

data.name: Tip_ForAuthor.Text
data.value: This section is available for site administrators and roles which are specified in "CrossVideo_Admin module - Admin Control Panel - Configurations - Author Roles".

data.name: Tip_ForRegisterUser.Text
data.value: This section is available for all registered users

data.name: secHelp_Charge.Text
data.value: I want to charge money before allow author post their videos, how to do that?
